string.company_introduce: ZEEWIND is a company dedicated to the develop and production of unmanned aerial vehicle detection and countermeasure equipment, aka CUAS devices. ZEEWIND not only provide professional airspace security solutions, in addition, we also offer industry-specific consulting services to help clients understand and meet their professional needs.
string.company_name_full: 深圳市智影达科技有限公司
string.company_slogan: 先进空域安全解决方案
string.contact_us_mention: 我们会在三个工作日内回复您.
string.ur_msg_placeholder: 告诉我们您想了解的任何内容

products.rce1u_describe: RCE-1U 是一款侦测反制一体式无人机反制设备，设备通过发射特定频段电磁波对无人机进行干扰反制，从而阻断无人机的通信或导航链路，快速实现目标的驱离或迫降。该产品，实时显示反制模式、电量等信息，可单独使用，也可与无人机探测产品组成 “察打一体” 系统。

detail_value.applicable_jamming: * 任何无线电通讯式机型

mention.rce1u: 我们对 DJI [Avatar, FPV, Mavic, Mavic Air, Mavic Mini, Mavic Phantom, Mavic Spark] 和 Parrot [ANAFI, Bebop, Bebop 2 Power] 这些机型进行了完整的测试, 理论上, 本产品的适用范围包括且不限于 [飞行器, 地面载具, 移动电话, 遥控器 (地面站) 等].
mention.interesting: We also have a cyberattack device under development, witch can hackin those type of drone and gain control permission. Check our [article](link) for more details.
